## 🐛 Description
A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## 🔁 Steps to Reproduce
1. Go to '...'
2. Run '...'
3. See error

## 🤔 Expected behavior
What you expected to happen.

## 📸 Screenshots / Logs
If applicable, add screenshots or logs.

## 🖥️ Environment
- OS: [e.g. Ubuntu 22.04]
- Python version: [e.g. 3.11]
- Docker/Compose version: [e.g. v2.22]
- Branch: [e.g. main, feature/...]
